data.name: Sur
data.detailed_description:
Expect high difficulty during your game because the game is friendly only in its appearance. Sur seeks to relive the feel of old games through scarce ammo and enemies that can kill you with just one hit.

Sur is a survival horror game inspired by survival horror classics. Help Vanessa guide her wheelchair to explore the Uroko hospital and escape from creatures that chase her in her biggest nightmare. Whether hiding or shooting firearms. Survive!

data.short_description: Sur is a survival horror game inspired by survival horror classics. Help Vanessa guide her wheelchair to explore the Uroko hospital and escape from creatures that chase her in her biggest nightmare. Whether hiding or shooting firearms. Survive!
data.supported_languages:
English, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Brazil*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content not suitable for all ages, or may not be suitable for viewing at work. Contains: Scenes of frequent or bloody violence depicted in vectorized animations or pixel art.
